t: Ord. No. 2012-03. AN INTERIM URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, ENACTED PURSUANT TO CALIFORNIA GOVERNMENT CODE SECTION 65868 ESTABLISHING A MORATORIUM ON PAWN SHOPS AND PROHIBITING THE ISSUANCE OF PERMITS AND OTHER LAND USE ENTITLEMENTS THAT WOULD ALLOW THE ESTABLISHMENT OF PAWN SHOPS WITHIN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON PENDING REVIEW AND POSSIBLE AMENDMENT OF ZONING REGULATIONS APPLICABLE TO SUCH BUSINESSES.
sp: library|us/ca/cities/american-canyon/ordinances|2012|City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2012-03
